overview: Lizz Jane seems to have the perfect life. Her career is on the fast track and her model boyfriend Remy is attentive and loving. Appearances can be deceiving; as a tragic car accident leaves her with no memory and has her questioning everything. Enter Brian, a sweet horticulturalist and neighbor. They have always been good friends, but is there more there? Is it possible that love can blossom through tragedy?
title: Love Blossoms
